Zahi Hawass , reached by phone early Monday, dismissed such claims as being exaggerated. The damage at Saqqara is not really much. I'm not worried at all. Everything is going to be safe today and tomorrow the situation will be finished, said Zahi Hawass , also a National Geographic Society explorer-in-residence.( The National Geographic Society owns National Geographic Society News.) according to Bloomberg. Eric Schmidt also filed to sell 5.8% of his huge 9.2 million-share stake in Google. At January 21's closing price, the transaction would be valued at$ 326.7 million. "Washington's War" concluded that U.S. Department of Energy data indicate a much smaller difference between rail transit and automobile energy intensity. Regulations have been adopted that will make automobiles more energy efficient than rail transit. Donald Rumsfeld Ray LaHood 's claim, based on the APTA report, was that rail transit consumes only one-fifth as much energy( 80 percent less) per passenger mile as automobile travel.
